section.name: Hypersonic
section.p: I did some short tests only, using Scarab with a Hypersonic database in file mode and very basic settings, but it worked right from the start.
Everything you will need for a very basic installation, is already included into Scarab.
Edit your build.properties and the property for database type to: scarab.database.type=hypersonic

Set all other necessary DB properties to point to your hypersonic DB, e.g.:
scarab.database.url=jdbc:hsqldb:file:/C:/test scarab.database.admin.username=SA scarab.database.admin.password= scarab.database.username=SA scarab.database.password=

Then run
mvn clean package -Dmaven.test.skip=true mvn initialize scarab:create-db -Dscarab.database.build.mode=sample -DapplicationRoot=target/scarab and it should work.
